General.Name: Khang Dien House Trading and Investment JSC
General.Description: Khang Dien House Trading and Investment Joint Stock Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate business in Vietnam. It trades in and leases houses; constructs houses for sale and lease; invests in the construction and operation of infrastructure projects; undertakes civil and industrial construction works; trades in real estate properties; and provides real-estate and construction consulting services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
